com.tractionsoftware.gwt.user.server
Class UTCDateTimeUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.tractionsoftware.gwt.user.server.UTCDateTimeUtils

public class UTCDateTimeUtils
extends java.lang.Object

These utilities are intended for use on the server-side to process the values of the UTCDateBox and UTCTimeBox.

Author:
andy

Method Detail

getTimeBoxValue

public static final java.lang.Long getTimeBoxValue(java.util.TimeZone zone,
                                                   java.util.Date date)
Returns an appropriate value for the UTCTimeBox for a specified TimeZone and Date.

Parameters:
zone - The TimeZone in which the Date will be rendered.
date - The Date which should be displayed in the UTCTimeBox
Returns:
the value for the UTCTimeBox or null if the supplied date is null

getDateBoxValue

public static final java.lang.Long getDateBoxValue(java.util.TimeZone zone,
                                                   java.util.Date date)
Returns the value for the UTCDateBox for a specified TimeZone and Date.

Parameters:
zone - The TimeZone in which the Date will be rendered.
date - The Date which should be displayed in the UTCTimeBox
Returns:
the value for the UTCDateBox or null if the supplied date is null

getDateValue

public static final java.util.Date getDateValue(java.util.TimeZone zone,
                                                java.lang.Long dateBoxValue,
                                                java.lang.Long timeBoxValue)
Returns the Date for the values of the UTCDateBox and UTCTimeBox which were edited in the specified TimeZone.

Parameters:
zone - The TimeZone in which the Date was edited.
dateBoxValue - The value of the UTCDateBox control.
timeBoxValue - The value of the UTCTimeBox control.
Returns:
The Date that has been selected from the controls or null if the supplied dateBoxValue is null. If the timeBoxValue is null, midnight is returned.
